Modifying Topic Properties

If you have appropriate privileges, you can modify any of the following topic and response properties:

  • Title and text.

  • Priority (Low, Normal, and High).

  • Status (Active or Inactive).

  • Recipients (list of people who received the topic or response).

  • Attachments (additional files included with the topic or response).

  • Values of any custom fields.

  • Additional revision comments or notes.

After you modify a property and confirm your changes, the application creates a new revision of the topic or response.

To modify topic or response properties:

  1. From the folder hierarchy, select the folder to which the topic or response is attached.

  2. Click the Topic tab on the upper pane.

  3. Do one of the following:

    • Double-click a topic or response.

    • Select the topic or response, then select Properties from the Topic menu, main context menu, or History context menu.

    The Topic Properties dialog opens.

  4. Change the properties, as desired.

  5. Enter remarks on the Comment tab to explain why you have made these changes.

  6. Click OK.
